title: Postal
text:
A new man can’t, a new man can’t
Choose what he wants to do
"Sir please help me, sir I need a box
And I don’t have the tools
What was that? Oh, come on
There has to be another way
Come for dinner, come and let me
Prove myself to you

Pace yourselves, friends
We have plenty of time to spend
Is this not enough?
Pace yourselves, friends
I have plenty of minds to bend
Is this not enough?"
They all looked at me and laughed
That’s good, right?
Joy means someone’s won some sort of fight
Someone affirm that bribing works around here

It’s all you
It’s on you
If only that were true!

A new man can’t choose what he wants to do

Man, I’ve had it with this system
There has to be another way out
Typical, everyone versus me

"Pace yourselves, friends
We have plenty of time to spend
Is this not enough?
Pace yourselves, friends
I have plenty of minds to bend
Is this not enough?"
They all looked at me and laughed
Shut up, right?
I should have won this fight
Why doesn’t bribery work around here?

It’s all you
It’s on you

I know it’s been a while since we’ve had this conversation but, uh..I, I thought you wanted success?

That wasn’t me!

Well it just depends on your definition of success, I guess
